kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: Opening browser 'chrome' to base url 'http://localhost:5173'.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

test.name: เพิ่มหมวดหมู่

kw.name: Login And Go To Category Page
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text '1' into text field 'css=input[name='username']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text '123' into text field 'css=input[name='password']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.msg: Clicking button 'css=button[type='submit']'.
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//span[contains(text(),'จัดการ')]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//a[contains(text(),'ประเภทสินค้า')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//a[contains(text(),'ประเภทสินค้า')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Generate Random Number
Evaluate
kw.msg: ${random} = 7841
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.msg: ${RANDOM} = 7841

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${name} = ทดสอบหมวดหมู่ 1234
kw.arg: ทดสอบหมวดหมู่ 1234
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'id=create-category-button'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'ทดสอบหมวดหมู่ 1234' into text field 'xpath=//input[@placeholder='ชื่อประเภทสินค้า']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//button[contains(normalize-space(.),'บันทึก')]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.msg: ${ok} = True
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'css=button.swal2-confirm'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.
